x-kubernetes-validations.rule: !('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.brokerNodeGroupInfo) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.brokerNodeGroupInfo))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.clusterName) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.clusterName))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.kafkaVersion) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.kafkaVersion))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.numberOfBrokerNodes) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.numberOfBrokerNodes))
